support.title: Support CodeReviewSystem
support.description: An open-source intelligent code review system dedicated to improving code quality and promoting team collaboration. Your support helps us continuously improve and provide better tools for the developer community.
support.supportButton: Support Project, Give us a Star!

intelligentReview.title: Intelligent Code Review
intelligentReview.description: AI-based automated code review to enhance code quality

security.title: Security Assurance
security.description: Comprehensive security detection to protect your code

efficiency.title: Efficient Development
efficiency.description: Streamlined review process to accelerate team collaboration

transparency.title: Transparent & Traceable
transparency.description: Complete review records and traceability mechanism

multiAgent.title: Advanced Multi-Agent Support
multiAgent.description: Multi-agent collaboration system providing more accurate code analysis and intelligent suggestions

thanksAnimation.title: Thank You for Your Support!
thanksAnimation.message: Every bit of your support drives us forward ❤️

documentation.title: Documentation

method1.title: One-Click Install
method1.description: Run the following command to complete one-click installation
method1.warning: Please ensure you trust this script as it will execute commands on your system

method2.title: Manual Install
method2.description: Manual installation provides more detailed configuration options, suitable for users who need custom configurations

step1.title: Step 1: Create Workflow Directory
step1.description: Create GitHub Actions workflow directory structure in the project root directory

step2.title: Step 2: Download AI Code Review Workflow
step2.description: Download the main workflow configuration file for AI code review

step4.title: Step 4: Configure GitHub Secrets
step4.description: Configure necessary Secrets in GitHub repository settings
step4.substep3: Find 'Secrets and variables' → 'Actions' in the left menu
step4.substep4: Click 'New repository secret' to add a new Secret

step5.title: Step 5: Verify Installation
step5.description: Create a PR to verify that the AI code review functionality is working properly
step5.warning: Ensure all Secrets are properly configured, otherwise code review will not work correctly

secrets.title: GitHub Secrets Configuration
secrets.description: Configure the following Secrets in your GitHub repository settings to enable code review functionality

documentation.oneClickInstallDescription: Run the following command to complete one-click installation

prTutorial.title: PR Creation Tutorial
prTutorial.description: Learn how to create a Pull Request (PR) to trigger AI code review

step1.title: Step 1: Create New Branch
step1.description: Create a new feature branch to develop your feature

step2.title: Step 2: Commit Code
step2.description: Add your changes to staging area and commit

step3.title: Step 3: Push Branch
step3.description: Push your local branch to remote repository

step4.title: Step 4: Create Pull Request
step4.instructions: Visit your GitHub repository page, click on the 'Pull requests' tab, then click the 'New pull request' button. Select your feature branch as the source branch and the main branch as the target branch, fill in the PR title and description, then create the PR.

step5.title: Step 5: Wait for AI Code Review
step5.description: AI code review will be automatically triggered
step5.success: After the PR is created successfully, AI code review will automatically start. You can view the results on the
